name: Bacchus Drinking Game
description:
Bacchus is a drinking game app made for you! Whether you are meeting with your friends at your home, in bar or even online!
Choose from different topics available, learn more about your friends or force them to drink! Every game is different so play for as long as you like!
The game is currently still in development so feel free to join us on

Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/BacchusDrinkingGame/

Instagram:https://www.instagram.com/bacchusdrinkinggame/
